name: Blink Dog
languages: Blink Dog, understands but cant speak Sylvan

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The blink dog has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.
